00067   uint16_t port;

00079     HT_ERROR("Hypertable.RangeServer.Timer.Interval property too large, exiting ...");
00080     exit(1);
00081   }
00082 
00083   if (m_scanner_ttl < (time_t)10) {
00084     HT_WARNF("Value %u for Hypertable.RangeServer.Scanner.ttl is too small, setting to 10", (unsigned int)m_scanner_ttl);

00090

00101     cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port=" << port << endl;
00102     //cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.workers=" << workerCount << endl;
00103   }
00104 
00105   //m_conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00106   //m_app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(workerCount);
00107 
00108   Global::protocol = new Hypertable::RangeServerProtocol();
00109 
00110   DfsBroker::Client *dfsClient = new DfsBroker::Client(m_conn_manager_ptr, props_ptr);

00112   if (m_verbose) {
00113     cout << "DfsBroker.Host=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", "") << endl;
00114     cout << "DfsBroker.Port=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Port", "") << endl;
00115     cout << "DfsBroker.Timeout=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Timeout", "") << endl;
00116   }
00117 
00118   if (!dfsClient->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00119     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00120     exit(1);

00128   {
00129     const char *logHost = props_ptr->get("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host", 0);

00131     struct sockaddr_in addr;

00133       InetAddr::initialize(&addr, logHost, logPort);

00150     std::string hostStr;
00151     struct sockaddr_in addr;    
00152 
00153     InetAddr::get_hostname(hostStr);
00154     if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, hostStr.c_str(), port))
00155       exit(1);
00156 
00157     m_location = (std::string)inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + "_" + (int)port;
00158   }
00159 
00160   if (initialize(props_ptr) != Error::OK)
00161     exit(1);
00162

00164   Global::maintenance_queue = new MaintenanceQueue(1);
00165

00167   m_live_map_ptr = new TableInfoMap();
00168   m_replay_map_ptr = new TableInfoMap();
00169 
00170   //fast_recover();
00171 
00175   {
00176     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfPtr(new HandlerFactory(comm, m_app_queue_ptr, this));
00177     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00178     InetAddr::initialize(&addr, INADDR_ANY, port);  // Listen on any interface
00179     if ((error = comm->listen(addr, chfPtr)) != Error::OK) {
00180       HT_ERRORF("Listen error address=%s:%d - %s", inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), port, Error::get_text(error));
00181       exit(1);
00182     }
00183   }
00184 
00188   m_master_client_ptr = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, 300, m_app_queue_ptr);
00189   m_master_connection_handler = new ConnectionHandler(comm, m_app_queue_ptr, this, m_master_client_ptr);
00190   m_master_client_ptr->initiate_connection(m_master_connection_handler);
00191

00218 int RangeServer::initialize(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr) {
00219   int error;
00220   bool exists;
00221   std::string top_dir;
00222   std::string meta_log_dir;
00223   std::string primary_log_dir;
00224 
00228   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers", &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00229     HT_ERRORF("Problem checking existence of '/hypertable/servers' Hyperspace directory - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00230     return error;
00231   }
00232 
00233   if (!exists) {
00234     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable");
00235     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable/servers")) != Error::OK) {
00236       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '/hypertable/servers' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00237       return error;
00238     }
00239   }
00240 
00241   top_dir = (std::string)"/hypertable/servers/" + m_location;
00242 
00247   uint32_t lockStatus;
00248   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00249   HandleCallbackPtr nullCallbackPtr;
00250 
00251   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(top_dir.c_str(), oflags, nullCallbackPtr, &m_existence_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00252     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating Hyperspace server existance file '%s' - %s", top_dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00253     exit(1);
00254   }
00255 
00256   while (true) {
00257 
00258     lockStatus = 0;
00259 
00260     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_existence_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lockStatus, &m_existence_file_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00261       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '%s' - %s", top_dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00262       exit(1);
00263     }
00264     
00265     if (lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED)
00266       break;
00267 
00268     cout << "Waiting for exclusive lock on hyperspace:/" << top_dir << " ..." << endl;
00269   }
00270 
00271   Global::logDir = top_dir + "/log";
00272 
00273   primary_log_dir = Global::logDir + "/primary";
00274 
00278   try { Global::logDfs->mkdirs(Global::logDir); }
00279   catch (Exception &e) {
00280     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating primary log directory '%s': %s",
00281               Global::logDir.c_str(), e.what());
00282     return error;
00283   }
00284 
00285   if (Global::verbose)
00286     cout << "logDir=" << Global::logDir << endl;
00287 
00288   Global::log = new CommitLog(Global::logDfs, primary_log_dir, props_ptr);
00289 
00290   return Error::OK;
00291 }

00299       throw Exception(error, msg);

00309 void RangeServer::fast_recover() {
00310   bool exists;
00311   std::string meta_log_dir = Global::logDir + "/meta";
00312   std::string primary_log_dir = Global::logDir + "/primary";
00313   RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr meta_log_reader_ptr;
00314   CommitLogReaderPtr primary_log_reader;
00315   RangeStates range_states;
00316   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00317   uint8_t *ptr, *end;
00318   uint8_t *base;
00319   size_t len;
00320   TableIdentifier table_id;
00321   uint64_t timestamp;
00322   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00323   RecoverUpdateCallback cb;
00324   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00325   RangePtr range_ptr;
00326   ByteString key, value;
00327 
00328   try {
00329 
00333     exists = Global::logDfs->exists(meta_log_dir);
00334 
00335     if (!exists)
00336       return;
00337 
00338     meta_log_reader_ptr = new RangeServerMetaLogReader(Global::logDfs, meta_log_dir);
00339 
00340     meta_log_reader_ptr->load_range_states(range_states);
00341 
00342     primary_log_reader = new CommitLogReader(Global::logDfs, primary_log_dir);
00343 
00344     while (primary_log_reader->next((const uint8_t **)&base, &len, &header)) {
00345 
00346       timestamp = header.get_timestamp();
00347 
00348       ptr = base;
00349       end = base + len;
00350 
00351       if (!table_id.decode((uint8_t **)&ptr, &len))
00352         throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_TRUNCATED_COMMIT_LOG, "");
00353 
00354       // Fetch table info
00355       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_id.id, table_info_ptr))
00356         continue;
00357 
00358       dbuf.ensure(table_id.encoded_length() + 12 + len);
00359       dbuf.clear();
00360 
00361       table_id.encode(&dbuf.ptr);
00362       Serialization::encode_long(&dbuf.ptr, timestamp);
00363 
00364       base = dbuf.ptr;
00365       dbuf.ptr += 4;
00366 
00367       while (ptr < end) {
00368 
00369         // extract the key
00370         key.ptr = ptr;
00371         ptr += key.length();
00372         if (ptr > end)
00373           throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
00374 
00375         // extract the value
00376         value.ptr = ptr;
00377         ptr += value.length();
00378         if (ptr > end)
00379           throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
00380 
00381         // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
00382         if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(key.str(), range_ptr))
00383           continue;
00384 
00385         // add key/value pair to buffer
00386         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, key.ptr, ptr-key.ptr);
00387         dbuf.ptr += ptr-key.ptr;
00388 
00389       }
00390 
00391       Serialization::encode_int((uint8_t **)&base, dbuf.ptr-(base+4));
00392 
00393       replay_update(&cb, dbuf.base, dbuf.fill());
00394     }
00395 
00396   }
00397   catch (Exception &e) {
00398     HT_ERRORF("Problem attempting fast recovery - %s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00399     exit(1);
00400   }
00401 
00402 }

00409 void RangeServer::compact(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, uint8_t compaction_type) {
00410   int error = Error::OK;
00411   std::string errMsg;
00412   TableInfoPtr tableInfoPtr;
00413   RangePtr range_ptr;
00414   bool major = false;
00415 
00416   // Check for major compaction
00417   if (compaction_type == 1)
00418     major = true;
00419 
00420   if (Global::verbose) {
00421     cout << *table;
00422     cout << *range;
00423     cout << "Compaction type = " << (major ? "major" : "minor") << endl;
00424   }
00425 
00429   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, tableInfoPtr)) {
00430     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00431     errMsg = "No ranges loaded for table '" + (std::string)table->name + "'";
00432     goto abort;
00433   }
00434 
00438   if (!tableInfoPtr->get_range(range, range_ptr)) {
00439     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00440     errMsg = (std::string)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]";
00441     goto abort;
00442   }
00443 
00444   // schedule the compaction
00445   if (!range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
00446     Global::maintenance_queue->add( new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_ptr, major) );
00447 
00448   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00449     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00450   }
00451 
00452   if (Global::verbose) {
00453     HT_INFOF("Compaction (%s) scheduled for table '%s' end row '%s'",
00454                 (major ? "major" : "minor"), table->name, range->end_row);
00455   }
00456 
00457   error = Error::OK;
00458 
00459  abort:
00460   if (error != Error::OK) {
00461     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errMsg.c_str());
00462     if ((error = cb->error(error, errMsg)) != Error::OK) {
00463       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00464     }
00465   }
00466 }

00473 void RangeServer::create_scanner(ResponseCallbackCreateScanner *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, ScanSpec *scan_spec) {
00474   uint8_t *kv_ptr, *kv_buffer = 0;
00475   int error = Error::OK;
00476   std::string errMsg;
00477   TableInfoPtr tableInfoPtr;
00478   RangePtr range_ptr;
00479   CellListScannerPtr scannerPtr;
00480   bool more = true;
00481   uint32_t id;
00482   Timestamp scan_timestamp;
00483   SchemaPtr schemaPtr;
00484   ScanContextPtr scanContextPtr;
00485 
00486   if (Global::verbose) {
00487     cout << "RangeServer::create_scanner" << endl;
00488     cout << *table;
00489     cout << *range;
00490     cout << *scan_spec;
00491   }
00492 
00493   try {
00494 
00495     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, tableInfoPtr))
00496       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (std::string)"unknown table '" + table->name + "'");
00497 
00498     if (!tableInfoPtr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00499       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00500                                   (std::string)"(a) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00501 
00502     schemaPtr = tableInfoPtr->get_schema();
00503 
00504     range_ptr->get_scan_timestamp(scan_timestamp);
00505 
00506     scanContextPtr = new ScanContext(scan_timestamp.logical, scan_spec, range, schemaPtr);
00507  
00508     scannerPtr = range_ptr->create_scanner(scanContextPtr);
00509 
00510     // TODO: fix this kludge (0 return above means range split)
00511     if (!scannerPtr)
00512       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00513                                   (std::string)"(b) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00514 
00515     kv_ptr = kv_buffer = new uint8_t [ 4 + DEFAULT_SCANBUF_SIZE ];
00516     uint32_t kv_len;
00517 
00518     more = FillScanBlock(scannerPtr, kv_buffer+4, DEFAULT_SCANBUF_SIZE, &kv_len);
00519     Serialization::encode_i32(&kv_ptr, kv_len);
00520 
00521     id = (more) ? Global::scannerMap.put(scannerPtr, range_ptr) : 0;
00522 
00523     if (Global::verbose) {
00524       HT_INFOF("Successfully created scanner (id=%d) on table '%s'", id, table->name);
00525     }
00526 
00530     {
00531       short moreFlag = more ? 0 : 1;
00532       StaticBuffer ext(kv_buffer, 4 + kv_len);
00533       if ((error = cb->response(moreFlag, id, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00534         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00535       }
00536     }
00537   }
00538   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00539     int error;
00540     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00541     if ((error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00542       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00543     }
00544   }
00545 }

00548 void RangeServer::destroy_scanner(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t scannerId) {
00549   HT_INFOF("destroying scanner id=%u", scannerId);
00550   Global::scannerMap.remove(scannerId);
00551   cb->response_ok();
00552 }

00554 
00555 void RangeServer::fetch_scanblock(ResponseCallbackFetchScanblock *cb, uint32_t scannerId) {
00556   string errMsg;
00557   int error = Error::OK;
00558   CellListScannerPtr scannerPtr;
00559   RangePtr range_ptr;
00560   bool more = true;
00561   uint8_t *kv_ptr, *kv_buffer = 0;
00562 
00563   if (Global::verbose) {
00564     cout << "RangeServer::fetch_scanblock" << endl;
00565     cout << "Scanner ID = " << scannerId << endl;
00566   }
00567 
00568   if (!Global::scannerMap.get(scannerId, scannerPtr, range_ptr)) {
00569     error = Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID;
00570     char tbuf[32];
00571     sprintf(tbuf, "%d", scannerId);
00572     errMsg = (string)tbuf;
00573     goto abort;    
00574   }
00575 
00576   kv_ptr = kv_buffer = new uint8_t [ 4 + DEFAULT_SCANBUF_SIZE ];
00577   uint32_t kv_len;
00578 
00579   more = FillScanBlock(scannerPtr, kv_buffer+4, DEFAULT_SCANBUF_SIZE, &kv_len);
00580   Serialization::encode_int(&kv_ptr, kv_len);
00581   
00582   if (!more)
00583     Global::scannerMap.remove(scannerId);
00584 
00588   {
00589     short moreFlag = more ? 0 : 1;
00590     StaticBuffer ext(kv_buffer, 4 + kv_len);
00591     if ((error = cb->response(moreFlag, scannerId, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00592       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00593     }
00594   }
00595 
00596   if (Global::verbose) {
00597     HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched %d bytes of scan data", kv_len);
00598   }
00599 
00600   error = Error::OK;
00601 
00602  abort:
00603   if (error != Error::OK) {
00604     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errMsg.c_str());
00605     if ((error = cb->error(error, errMsg)) != Error::OK) {
00606       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00607     }
00608   }
00609 }

00611 
00615 void RangeServer::load_range(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, const char *transfer_log_dir, RangeState *range_state, uint16_t flags) {
00616   std::string errMsg;
00617   int error = Error::OK;
00618   SchemaPtr schemaPtr;
00619   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00620   RangePtr range_ptr;
00621   string tableHdfsDir;
00622   string rangeHdfsDir;
00623   char md5DigestStr[33];
00624   bool registerTable = false;
00625   bool is_root = !strcmp(table->name, "METADATA") && (*range->start_row == 0) && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW);
00626   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00627   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00628   ScanSpec scan_spec;
00629   KeySpec key;
00630   std::string metadata_key_str;
00631   bool replay = (flags & RangeServerProtocol::LOAD_RANGE_FLAG_REPLAY) == RangeServerProtocol::LOAD_RANGE_FLAG_REPLAY;
00632 
00633   if (Global::verbose) {
00634     cout << "load_range" << endl;
00635     cout << *table;
00636     cout << *range;
00637     cout << "flags = " << flags << endl;
00638     cout << flush;
00639   }
00640 
00641   try {
00642 
00643     if (replay) {
00644 
00646       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00647         if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00648           table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schemaPtr);
00649           registerTable = true;
00650         }
00651         else
00652           table_info_ptr = table_info_ptr->create_shallow_copy();
00653       }
00654 
00655     }
00656     else {
00658       if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00659         table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schemaPtr);
00660         registerTable = true;
00661       }
00662     }
00663 
00667     if ((error = verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation, errMsg)) != Error::OK)
00668       throw Exception(error, errMsg);
00669 
00670 
00671     if (registerTable) {
00672       if (replay)
00673         m_replay_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
00674       else
00675         m_live_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
00676     }
00677         
00681     if (table_info_ptr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00682       throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_ALREADY_LOADED, (std::string)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00683 
00687     if (!Global::metadata_table_ptr) {
00688       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00689       Global::metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00690     }
00691 
00692     if (!replay) {
00693 
00699       if (!is_root) {
00700 
00701         metadata_key_str = std::string("") + (uint32_t)table->id + ":" + range->end_row;
00702 
00706         mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00707 
00708         key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00709         key.row_len = strlen(metadata_key_str.c_str());
00710         key.column_family = "Location";
00711         key.column_qualifier = 0;
00712         key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00713         mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()));
00714         mutator_ptr->flush();
00715 
00716       }
00717       else {  //root
00718         uint64_t handle;
00719         HandleCallbackPtr nullCallbackPtr;
00720         uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE;
00721 
00722         HT_INFO("Loading root METADATA range");
00723 
00724         if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", oflags, nullCallbackPtr, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00725           HT_ERRORF("Problem creating Hyperspace root file '/hypertable/root' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00726           HT_ABORT;
00727         }
00728 
00729         if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "location", m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00730           HT_ERRORF("Problem creating attribute 'location' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00731           HT_ABORT;
00732         }
00733 
00734         m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00735       }
00736 
00737       schemaPtr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
00738 
00743       {
00744         assert(*range->end_row != 0);
00745         md5_string(range->end_row, md5DigestStr);
00746         md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00747         tableHdfsDir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + (string)table->name;
00748         list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *lgList = schemaPtr->get_access_group_list();
00749         for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator lgIter = lgList->begin(); lgIter != lgList->end(); lgIter++) {
00750           // notice the below variables are different "range" vs. "table"
00751           rangeHdfsDir = tableHdfsDir + "/" + (*lgIter)->name + "/" + md5DigestStr;
00752           Global::dfs->mkdirs(rangeHdfsDir);
00753         }
00754       }
00755     }
00756 
00757     range_ptr = new Range(m_master_client_ptr, table, schemaPtr, range, range_state);
00758 
00764     if (!replay) {
00765       if (transfer_log_dir && *transfer_log_dir) {
00766         CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, transfer_log_dir);
00767         uint64_t timestamp = Global::log->get_timestamp();
00768         range_ptr->replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp);
00769         if ((error = Global::log->link_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp)) != Error::OK)
00770           throw Exception(error, (std::string)"Unable to link external log '" + transfer_log_dir + "' into commit log");
00771       }
00772     }
00773 
00774     table_info_ptr->add_range(range_ptr);
00775 
00776     if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00777       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00778     }
00779     else {
00780       HT_INFOF("Successfully loaded range %s[%s..%s]", table->name, range->start_row, range->end_row);
00781     }
00782 
00783   }
00784   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00785     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), e.what());
00786     if ((error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00787       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00788     }
00789   }
00790 }
00791 
00792 
00793 void RangeServer::reload_range(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, uint64_t soft_limit, const String &split_log) {
00794   
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00798 namespace {
00799 
00800   typedef struct {
00801     const uint8_t *base;
00802     size_t len;
00803   } UpdateRecT;
00804 
00805   typedef struct {
00806     int error;
00807     uint32_t offset;
00808     uint32_t len;
00809   } SendBackRecT;
00810 
00811   typedef struct {
00812     RangePtr range_ptr;
00813     Timestamp timestamp;
00814   } MinTimestampRecT;
00815 }
00816 
00817 
00818 
00822 void RangeServer::update(ResponseCallbackUpdate *cb, TableIdentifier *table, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00823   uint8_t *mod_ptr;
00824   const uint8_t *mod_end;
00825   const uint8_t *add_base_ptr;
00826   const uint8_t *add_end_ptr;
00827   uint8_t *ts_ptr;
00828   const uint8_t auto_ts[8] = { 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff };
00829   string errMsg;
00830   int error = Error::OK;
00831   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00832   uint64_t update_timestamp = 0;
00833   uint64_t min_timestamp = 0;
00834   const char *row;
00835   std::string split_row;
00836   vector<UpdateRecT> goMods;
00837   vector<UpdateRecT> splitMods;
00838   UpdateRecT update;
00839   CommitLogPtr splitLogPtr;
00840   size_t goSize = 0;
00841   size_t splitSize = 0;
00842   std::string end_row;
00843   std::vector<MinTimestampRecT>  min_ts_vector;
00844   MinTimestampRecT  min_ts_rec;
00845   uint64_t next_timestamp;
00846   uint64_t temp_timestamp;
00847   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00848   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00849   bool split_pending;
00850   ByteString key, value;
00851   bool a_locked = false;
00852   bool b_locked = false;
00853   vector<SendBackRecT> send_back_vector;
00854   uint8_t *send_back_ptr = 0;
00855   uint32_t misses = 0;
00856 
00857   min_ts_vector.reserve(50);
00858 
00859   if (Global::verbose) {
00860     cout << "RangeServer::update" << endl;
00861     cout << *table;
00862   }
00863 
00864   // TODO: Sanity check mod data (checksum validation)
00865 
00866   try {
00867 
00868     // Fetch table info
00869     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00870       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [ 12 ], 12);
00871       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
00872       Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND);
00873       Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, 0);
00874       Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, buffer.size);
00875       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find table info for table '%s'", table->name);
00876       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK)
00877         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00878       return;
00879     }
00880 
00881     // verify schema
00882     if ((error = verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation, errMsg)) != Error::OK) {
00883       HT_ERRORF("%s", errMsg.c_str());
00884       cb->error(error, errMsg);
00885       return;
00886     }
00887 
00888     mod_end = buffer.base + buffer.size;
00889     mod_ptr = buffer.base;
00890 
00891     goMods.clear();
00892 
00893     m_update_mutex_a.lock();
00894     a_locked = true;
00895 
00896     send_back_ptr = 0;
00897 
00898     while (mod_ptr < mod_end) {
00899 
00900       key.ptr = mod_ptr;
00901 
00902       row = key.str();
00903     
00904       // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
00905       if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, min_ts_rec.range_ptr)) {
00906         if (send_back_ptr == 0)
00907           send_back_ptr = mod_ptr;
00908         key.next(); // skip key
00909         key.next(); // skip value;
00910         mod_ptr = key.ptr;
00911         misses++;
00912         continue;
00913       }
00914 
00915       if (send_back_ptr) {
00916         SendBackRecT send_back;
00917         send_back.error = Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
00918         send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
00919         send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
00920         send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
00921         send_back_ptr = 0;
00922       }
00923 
00924       add_base_ptr = mod_ptr;
00925     
00927       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->increment_update_counter();
00928 
00929       // Make sure range didn't just shrink
00930       if (strcmp(row, (min_ts_rec.range_ptr->start_row()).c_str()) <= 0) {
00931         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
00932         continue;
00933       }
00934 
00936       min_timestamp = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_latest_timestamp();
00937 
00939       update_timestamp = Global::log->get_timestamp();
00940 
00941       end_row = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->end_row();
00942 
00944       split_pending = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_split_info(split_row, splitLogPtr);
00945 
00946       splitMods.clear();
00947       splitSize = 0;
00948 
00949       next_timestamp = 0;
00950       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = 0;
00951       min_ts_rec.timestamp.real = update_timestamp;
00952 
00953       while (mod_ptr < mod_end && (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
00954 
00955         // If timestamp value is set to AUTO (zero one's compliment), then assign a timestamp
00956         ts_ptr = mod_ptr + key.length() - 8;
00957         if (!memcmp(ts_ptr, auto_ts, 8)) {
00958           if (next_timestamp == 0) {
00959             boost::xtime now;
00960             boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00961             next_timestamp = ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (uint64_t)now.nsec;
00962           }
00963           temp_timestamp = ++next_timestamp;
00964           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
00965             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
00966           Key::encode_ts64(&ts_ptr, temp_timestamp);
00967         }
00968         else {
00969           uint8_t flag = *(ts_ptr-1);
00970           temp_timestamp = Key::decode_ts64((const uint8_t **)&ts_ptr);
00971           if (flag > FLAG_DELETE_CELL && temp_timestamp <= min_timestamp) {
00972             error = Error::RANGESERVER_TIMESTAMP_ORDER_ERROR;
00973             errMsg = (string)"Update timestamp " + temp_timestamp + " is <= previously seen timestamp of " + min_timestamp;
00974             min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
00975             m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
00976             goto abort;
00977           }
00978           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
00979             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
00980         }
00981 
00982         update.base = mod_ptr;
00983         key.next(); // skip key
00984         key.next(); // skip value
00985         mod_ptr = key.ptr;
00986         update.len = mod_ptr - update.base;
00987         if (split_pending && strcmp(row, split_row.c_str()) <= 0) {
00988           splitMods.push_back(update);
00989           splitSize += update.len;
00990         }
00991         else {
00992           goMods.push_back(update);
00993           goSize += update.len;
00994         }
00995         if (mod_ptr < mod_end)
00996           row = key.str();
00997       }
00998 
00999       add_end_ptr = mod_ptr;
01000 
01001       // force scans to only see updates before the earliest time in this range
01002       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical--;
01003       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add_update_timestamp( min_ts_rec.timestamp );
01004       min_ts_vector.push_back(min_ts_rec);
01005 
01006       if (splitSize > 0) {
01007         DynamicBuffer dbuf( splitSize + table->encoded_length() );
01008 
01009         table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01010 
01011         items_added += splitMods.size();
01012         memory_added += splitSize;
01013 
01014         for (size_t i=0; i<splitMods.size(); i++) {
01015           memcpy(dbuf.ptr, splitMods[i].base, splitMods[i].len);
01016           dbuf.ptr += splitMods[i].len;
01017         }
01018 
01019         HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (splitSize + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01020 
01021         if ((error = splitLogPtr->write(dbuf, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01022           errMsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to split log";
01023           m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01024           goto abort;
01025         }
01026       }
01027 
01031       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->lock();
01032       {
01033         uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)add_base_ptr;
01034         while (ptr < add_end_ptr) {
01035           key.ptr = ptr;
01036           ptr += key.length();
01037           value.ptr = ptr;
01038           ptr += value.length();
01039           if ((error = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add(key, value, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01040             SendBackRecT send_back;
01041             send_back.error = error;
01042             send_back.offset = key.ptr - buffer.base;
01043             send_back.len = add_end_ptr - key.ptr;
01044             send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01045             break;
01046           }
01047         }
01048       }
01049       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->unlock(update_timestamp);
01050 
01054       {
01055         std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityDataT> priority_data_vec;
01056         std::vector<AccessGroup *> compactions;
01057         uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
01058 
01059         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01060         for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01061           disk_usage += priority_data_vec[i].disk_used;
01062           if (!priority_data_vec[i].in_memory && priority_data_vec[i].mem_used >= (uint32_t)Global::localityGroupMaxMemory)
01063             compactions.push_back(priority_data_vec[i].ag);
01064         }
01065 
01066         if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->is_root() &&
01067             (disk_usage > min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_size_limit() || 
01068              (Global::range_metadata_max_bytes && table->id == 0 && disk_usage > Global::range_metadata_max_bytes))) {
01069           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
01070             Global::maintenance_queue->add( new MaintenanceTaskSplit(min_ts_rec.range_ptr) );
01071         }
01072         else if (!compactions.empty()) {
01073           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance()) {
01074             for (size_t i=0; i<compactions.size(); i++)
01075               compactions[i]->set_compaction_bit();
01076             Global::maintenance_queue->add( new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(min_ts_rec.range_ptr, false) );
01077           }
01078         }
01079       }
01080 
01081       if (Global::verbose) {
01082         HT_INFOF("Added %d (%d split off) updates to '%s'", goMods.size()+splitMods.size(), splitMods.size(), table->name);
01083       }
01084     }
01085 
01086     if (send_back_ptr) {
01087       SendBackRecT send_back;
01088       send_back.error = Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
01089       send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
01090       send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
01091       send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01092       send_back_ptr = 0;
01093     }
01094 
01095     m_update_mutex_b.lock();
01096     m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01097     b_locked = true;
01098 
01102     if (goSize > 0) {
01103       DynamicBuffer dbuf( goSize + table->encoded_length() );
01104 
01105       table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01106 
01107       items_added += goMods.size();
01108       memory_added += goSize;
01109 
01110       for (size_t i=0; i<goMods.size(); i++) {
01111         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, goMods[i].base, goMods[i].len);
01112         dbuf.ptr += goMods[i].len;
01113       }
01114 
01115       HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (goSize + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01116 
01117       if ((error = Global::log->write(dbuf, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01118         errMsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to commit log";
01119         m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01120         goto abort;
01121       }
01122     }
01123 
01124     m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01125 
01126     if (Global::verbose && misses) {
01127       HT_INFOF("Sent back %d updates because out-of-range", misses);
01128     }
01129 
01130     error = Error::OK;
01131   }
01132   catch (Exception &e) {
01133     HT_ERRORF("Exception caught: %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01134     error = e.code();
01135     errMsg = e.what();
01136     if (b_locked)
01137       m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01138     else if (a_locked)
01139       m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01140   }
01141 
01142  abort:
01143 
01144   Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01145   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01146 
01147   {
01148     uint64_t mt_memory = Global::memory_tracker.get_memory();
01149     uint64_t mt_items = Global::memory_tracker.get_items();
01150     uint64_t vm_estimate = mt_memory + (mt_items*120);
01151     HT_INFOF("drj mem=%lld items=%lld vm-est%lld", mt_memory, mt_items, vm_estimate);
01152   }
01153 
01154   splitLogPtr = 0;
01155 
01156   // unblock scanner timestamp and decrement update counter
01157   for (size_t i=0; i<min_ts_vector.size(); i++) {
01158     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->remove_update_timestamp(min_ts_vector[i].timestamp);
01159     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01160   }
01161 
01162   if (error == Error::OK) {
01166     if (!send_back_vector.empty()) {
01167       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [ send_back_vector.size() * 12 ], send_back_vector.size() * 12);
01168       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
01169       for (size_t i=0; i<send_back_vector.size(); i++) {
01170         Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].error);
01171         Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].offset);
01172         Serialization::encode_int(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].len);
01173       }
01174       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK) {
01175         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01176       }
01177     }
01178     else {
01179       if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
01180         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01181       }
01182     }
01183   }
01184   else {
01185     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errMsg.c_str());
01186     if ((error = cb->error(error, errMsg)) != Error::OK) {
01187       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01188     }
01189   }
01190 }
01191 
01192 
01193 
01194 void RangeServer::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table) {
01195   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01196   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vector;
01197   std::string metadata_prefix;
01198   std::string metadata_key; // ***********  = std::string("") + (uint32_t)m_table_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
01199   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
01200   KeySpec key;
01201 
01202   if (Global::verbose) {
01203     HT_INFOF("drop_table '%s'", table->name);  
01204     cout << flush;
01205   }
01206 
01207   // create METADATA table mutator for clearing 'Location' columns
01208   mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
01209 
01210   // initialize key structure
01211   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
01212   key.column_family = "Location";
01213 
01214   try {
01215 
01216      // For each range in dropped table, Set the 'drop' bit and clear
01217     // the 'Location' column of the corresponding METADATA entry
01218     if (m_live_map_ptr->remove(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01219       metadata_prefix = std::string("") + table_info_ptr->get_id() + ":";
01220       table_info_ptr->get_range_vector(range_vector);
01221       for (size_t i=0; i<range_vector.size(); i++) {
01222         range_vector[i]->drop();
01223         metadata_key = metadata_prefix + range_vector[i]->end_row();
01224         key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
01225         key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
01226         mutator_ptr->set(key, "!", 1);
01227       }
01228       range_vector.clear();
01229     }
01230     else {
01231       HT_ERRORF("drop_table '%s' - table not found", table->name);
01232     }
01233     mutator_ptr->flush();
01234   }
01235   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01236     HT_ERRORF("Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01237     cb->error(e.code(), "Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA");
01238     return;
01239   }
01240 
01241   if (Global::verbose) {
01242     HT_INFOF("Successfully dropped table '%s'", table->name);  
01243     cout << flush;
01244   }
01245 
01246   cb->response_ok();
01247 }
01248 
01249 
01250 void RangeServer::dump_stats(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01251   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01252   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01253   
01254   HT_INFO("dump_stats");
01255 
01256   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01257 
01258   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++) {
01259     range_vec.clear();
01260     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01261     for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
01262       range_vec[i]->dump_stats();
01263   }
01264   cb->response_ok();
01265 }
01266 
01267 
01271 void RangeServer::replay_start(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01272   String replay_log_dir = format("/hypertable/servers/%s/log/replay",
01273                                  m_location.c_str());
01274   if (Global::verbose) {
01275     HT_INFO("replay_start");
01276     cout << flush;
01277   }
01278 
01279   m_replay_log_ptr = 0;
01280 
01281   m_replay_map_ptr->clear_ranges();
01282 
01286   try { Global::logDfs->rmdir(replay_log_dir); }
01287   catch (Exception &e) {
01288     HT_ERRORF("Problem removing replay log directory: %s", e.what());
01289     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem removing replay log directory: %s",
01290               e.what()));
01291     return;
01292   }
01293 
01297   try { Global::logDfs->mkdirs(replay_log_dir); }
01298   catch (Exception &e) {
01299     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating replay log directory: %s ", e.what());
01300     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem creating replay log directory: %s",
01301               e.what()));
01302     return;
01303   }
01304 
01305   m_replay_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::logDfs, replay_log_dir, m_props_ptr);
01306 
01307   cb->response_ok();
01308 }
01309 
01310 
01311 void RangeServer::replay_update(ResponseCallback *cb, const uint8_t *data, size_t len) {
01312   TableIdentifier table_identifier;
01313   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01314   ByteString key, value;
01315   uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)data;
01316   const uint8_t *end_ptr = data + len;
01317   const uint8_t *block_end_ptr;
01318   uint32_t block_size;
01319   size_t remaining = len;
01320   const char *row;
01321   String err_msg;
01322   uint64_t timestamp;
01323   RangePtr range_ptr;
01324   String end_row;
01325   uint32_t count;
01326   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
01327   uint64_t items_added = 0;
01328 
01329   if (Global::verbose) {
01330     HT_INFOF("replay_update - length=%ld", len);
01331     cout << flush;
01332   }
01333 
01334   try {
01335 
01336     while (ptr < end_ptr) {
01337 
01338       // decode table identifier + timestamp + key/value block size
01339       if (!table_identifier.decode(&ptr, &remaining) ||
01340           !Serialization::decode_long(&ptr, &remaining, &timestamp) ||
01341           !Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, &block_size))
01342         throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Update block header truncated");
01343 
01344       if (block_size > remaining)
01345         throw Exception(Error::MALFORMED_REQUEST, String("Block (size=") + block_size + ") exceeds end of message");
01346 
01347       block_end_ptr = ptr + block_size;
01348 
01349       // Fetch table info
01350       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_identifier.id, table_info_ptr))
01351         throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, format("Unable to find table info for table name='%s' id=%u", table_identifier.name, table_identifier.id));
01352 
01353       while (ptr < block_end_ptr) {
01354 
01355         row = ByteString(ptr).str();
01356 
01357         // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
01358         if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, range_ptr))
01359           throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, format("Unable to find range for row '%s'", row));
01360 
01361         end_row = range_ptr->end_row();
01362 
01363         while (ptr < block_end_ptr && 
01364                (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
01365 
01366           // extract the key
01367           key.ptr = ptr;
01368           ptr += key.length();
01369           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01370             throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
01371 
01372           value.ptr = ptr;
01373           ptr += value.length();
01374           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01375             throw Exception(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
01376 
01377           HT_EXPECT(range_ptr->replay_add(key, value, timestamp, &count) == Error::OK, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01378 
01379           if (count) {
01380             items_added += count;
01381             memory_added += count * (ptr - key.ptr);
01382           }
01383         }
01384       }
01385     }
01386 
01387     Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01388     Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01389 
01390   }
01391   catch (Exception &e) {
01392     HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
01393     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
01394     return;
01395   }
01396 
01397   cb->response_ok();
01398 }
01399 
01400 
01401 void RangeServer::replay_commit(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01402 
01403   HT_EXPECT(m_replay_log_ptr, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01404 
01405   if (Global::verbose) {
01406     HT_INFO("replay_commit");
01407     cout << flush;
01408   }
01409 
01410   try {
01411     m_live_map_ptr->atomic_merge(m_replay_map_ptr, m_replay_log_ptr.get());
01412   }
01413   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01414     HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
01415     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
01416     return;
01417   }
01418 
01419   cb->response_ok();
01420 }
01421 
01422 
01423 
01424 void RangeServer::drop_range(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range) {
01425   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01426   RangePtr range_ptr;
01427 
01428   if (Global::verbose) {
01429     cout << "drop_range" << endl;
01430     cout << *table;
01431     cout << *range;
01432     cout << flush;
01433   }
01434 
01436   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01437     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, std::string("No ranges loaded for table '") + table->name + "'");
01438     return;
01439   }
01440 
01442   if (!table_info_ptr->remove_range(range, range_ptr)) {
01443     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (std::string)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
01444     return;
01445   }
01446 
01447   cb->response_ok();
01448 }
01449 
01450 
01451 
01452 int RangeServer::verify_schema(TableInfoPtr &table_info_ptr, int generation, std::string &err_msg) {
01453   std::string tableFile = (std::string)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_info_ptr->get_name();
01454   DynamicBuffer valueBuf;
01455   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
01456   int error;
01457   uint64_t handle;
01458   SchemaPtr schemaPtr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
01459 
01460   if (schemaPtr.get() == 0 || schemaPtr->get_generation() < generation) {
01461 
01462     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tableFile.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
01463       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '%s' (%s)", tableFile.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
01464       exit(1);
01465     }
01466 
01467     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valueBuf)) != Error::OK) {
01468       err_msg = (std::string)"Problem getting 'schema' attribute for '" + tableFile + "'";
01469       return error;
01470     }
01471 
01472     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
01473 
01474     schemaPtr = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valueBuf.base, valueBuf.fill(), true);
01475     if (!schemaPtr->is_valid()) {
01476       err_msg = (std::string)"Schema Parse Error for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' : " + schemaPtr->get_error_string();
01477       return Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR;
01478     }
01479 
01480     table_info_ptr->update_schema(schemaPtr);
01481 
01482     // Generation check ...
01483     if ( schemaPtr->get_generation() < generation ) {
01484       err_msg = (std::string)"Fetched Schema generation for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' is " + schemaPtr->get_generation() + " but supplied is " + generation;
01485       return Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH;
01486     }
01487   }
01488   
01489   return Error::OK;
01490 }
01491 
01492 
01493 
01494 void RangeServer::do_maintenance() {
01495   struct timeval tval;
01496 
01500   Global::scannerMap.purge_expired(m_scanner_ttl);
01501 
01505   gettimeofday(&tval, 0);
01506   if ((tval.tv_sec - m_last_commit_log_clean) >= (int)(m_timer_interval*4)/5) {
01507     // schedule log cleanup
01508     Global::maintenance_queue->add( new MaintenanceTaskLogCleanup(this) );
01509     m_last_commit_log_clean = tval.tv_sec;
01510   }
01511 }
01512 
01513 
01514 
01518 void RangeServer::log_cleanup() {
01519   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01520   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01521   std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityDataT> priority_data_vec;
01522   LogFragmentPriorityMap log_frag_map;
01523   std::set<size_t> compaction_set;
01524   uint64_t timestamp, oldest_cached_timestamp = 0;
01525   uint64_t prune_threshold = 2 * Global::log->get_max_fragment_size();
01526 
01527   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01528   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++)
01529     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01530 
01534   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++) {
01535     size_t start = priority_data_vec.size();
01536     range_vec[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01537     for (size_t j=start; j<priority_data_vec.size(); j++) {
01538       priority_data_vec[j].user_data = (void *)i;
01539       if ((timestamp = priority_data_vec[j].ag->get_oldest_cached_timestamp()) != 0) {
01540         if (oldest_cached_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < oldest_cached_timestamp)
01541           oldest_cached_timestamp = timestamp;
01542       }
01543     }
01544   }
01545 
01546   Global::log->load_fragment_priority_map(log_frag_map);
01547 
01552   for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01553     LogFragmentPriorityMap::iterator map_iter = log_frag_map.lower_bound( priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp );
01554     size_t rangei = (size_t)priority_data_vec[i].user_data;
01555 
01556     // this should never happen
01557     if (map_iter == log_frag_map.end())
01558       continue;
01559 
01560     if ( priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp > 0 && (*map_iter).second.cumulative_size > prune_threshold ) {
01561       std::string range_str = range_vec[rangei]->table_name() + "[" + range_vec[rangei]->start_row() + ".." + range_vec[rangei]->end_row() + "]." + priority_data_vec[i].ag->get_name();
01562       priority_data_vec[i].ag->set_compaction_bit();
01563       compaction_set.insert( rangei );
01564       HT_INFOF("Compacting %s because cumulative log size of %lld exceeds threshold %lld",
01565                range_str.c_str(), (*map_iter).second.cumulative_size, prune_threshold);
01566     }
01567   }
01568 
01572   for (std::set<size_t>::iterator iter = compaction_set.begin(); iter != compaction_set.end(); iter++) {
01573     if (!range_vec[*iter]->test_and_set_maintenance())
01574       Global::maintenance_queue->add( new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_vec[*iter], false) );
01575   }
01576 
01580   if (oldest_cached_timestamp != 0)
01581     Global::log->purge(oldest_cached_timestamp);
01582 
01583 }
01584 
01585 
01586 
01589 uint64_t RangeServer::get_timer_interval() {
01590   return m_timer_interval*1000;
01591 }
